T02D1383:273a-1: k'a la tsa kra aa ba t'a ra n'a ma /
T02D1383:273a-3: dus kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1383:273a-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1383:273a-5: shes rab snying rje gnyis med bde ba mtha' med pa //
T02D1383:273a-6: sna tshogs rnam pa 'dzin la rtog pa med pa'i gzugs //
T02D1383:273a-7: gzugs med gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sku //
T02D1383:273a-8: rgyal ba skye bo kun gyi gnyug ma la phyag 'tshal //
T02D1383:273a-9: gang zhig nam mkha'i dpal rnams ma lus ster byed cing //
T02D1383:273a-10: 'byor pa dang ni rgud pa yang ni ston mdzad pa //
T02D1383:273a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi nang ltar gsal byed pa'i //
T02D1383:273a-12: gza' skar de dag thog mar mun las rgyal gyur
T02D1383:273a-13: cig /'dir gang gi phyir ser snas nye bar nyams
T02D1383:273a-14: pa'i mu stegs pa rnams kyi rtsis kyi grub pa'i
T02D1383:273a-15: mtha' sbas te byed pa nyung du'i spros pa mang
T02D1383:273a-16: po byas kyang me shes pa'i phyir da ni bstan
T02D1383:273a-17: par bya ste / dang por gsum dang drug cus lhag pa'i bzhi brgya phri par bya'o //
T02D1383:273a-18: dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa'i nag pa'i zla
T02D1383:273a-19: ba la sogs pa lor gang gi gyur pa de'i
T02D1383:273a-20: tshe de rnams de la bsre par bya'o //
T02D1383:273a-21: de la gnyis dang brgyad cu dang brgya phri pa ni dag pa'i lo'i brtan par 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:273a-22: de la nyi mas bsgyur bas zla ba'i tshogs so //
T02D1383:273a-23: dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa nas gnam stong
T02D1383:273a-24: gi mthar thug pa nag pa la sogs pa'i zla
T02D1383:273a-25: bar gyur pa de la bsres te /
T02D1383:273a-26: gnas gnyis su bzhag la 'og na gnas pa bzhis
T02D1383:273a-27: bsgyur nas nam mkha' me dang zla bas bgo zhing
T02D1383:273a-29: thob pa rnams steng du bcug par gyur pas steng ma dag pa'i zla ba'i phung por 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:273a-30: gang gi tshe dbyar zla 'bring po gnyis byung pa
T02D1383:273b-0: de'i tshe @273b zla ba bcu gsum gyis lor bya'o
T02D1383:273b-1: // zla ba gnyis po gcig tu bgrang zhing nag pa'i zla bar yang gzhug par mi bya'o //
T02D1383:273b-2: de nas dag pa'i zla ba'i phung po de gnas gsum du byas te /
T02D1383:273b-3: dbus ma'i phung po lag pa dang rtse mo can
T02D1383:273b-4: gyis bsgyur pa la 'og na gnas pa la drug
T02D1383:273b-5: gis thob pas sbyang par bya'o //
T02D1383:273b-6: gal te bgos pa'i lhag ma yod na de'i tshe yang drug gi thob pa'i chas sbyang par bya'o //
T02D1383:273b-7: 'dir 'og na gnas pa la sum cus bsre zhing
T02D1383:273b-8: drug cus bgos pas thob pa steng mar gnyis bsres
T02D1383:273b-9: par gzhug go // bgos pa'i lhag ma dbyu gu'i phung por 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:273b-10: steng ma bdun gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma gza'i phung por 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:273b-11: thob pa ni ci yang ma yin no //
T02D1383:273b-12: slar yang zla ba dag pa'i phung por gnyis dang
T02D1383:273b-13: bcus lhag pa'i brgya bsres la gnas gnyis su byas
T02D1383:273b-14: te / 'og na gnas pa la dus dang /
T02D1383:273b-15: nyi mas bgos pa'i lhag ma ril po'i cha shas su 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:273b-16: bgos pas thob pa la lnga bsres la steng ma gnyis kyis bsgyur par spyin no //
T02D1383:273b-17: de nas steng ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bgos
T02D1383:273b-18: la bgos pa'i lhag ma rkang pa'i ril por 'gyur
T02D1383:273b-22: ril po'i cha shas rnams rim par 'og ma 'og mar dbri par bya'o //
T02D1383:273b-23: yang dag pa'i zla ba gnas gsum gyi dbus mar
T02D1383:273b-24: gnas pa dbang phyug gis bsgyur zhing 'og ma la
T02D1383:273b-25: sum cu rtsa dgus bgos pas thob par gnyis bsres
T02D1383:273b-27: dbyu gu drug cus bgos shing bgos pa'i lhag ma rgyu skar gyi dbyu gur shes par bya'o //
T02D1383:273b-28: thob pa ni steng ma gnyis kyis bsgyur pa la spyin par bya'o //
T02D1383:273b-29: de nas steng ma nyi shu rtsa bdun gyis bgos
T02D1383:273b-30: pa'i lhag ma skar ma'i phung por shes par bya'o
T02D1383:273b-31: // 'dir rgyu skar gyi phung po'i 'og tu rgyu skar gyi dbyu gu'i phung po dbri par bya'o //
T02D1383:273b-32: gang gi tshe lo'i phung por lo dang /
T02D1383:273b-33: dag pa'i zla ba'i phung por yang zla ba ma bcug na /
T02D1383:273b-34: de'i tshe zla ba so so la gza' dang /
T02D1383:273b-37: ril po'i cha shas rnams su go rims bzhin du
T02D1383:273b-38: gcig dang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang gnyis dang gcig
T02D1383:273b-39: rnams sbyin no // rgyu skar dang de'i dbyu gur gnyis dang drag po dag sbyin no //
T02D1383:274a-1: sogs pa bcug na ni gza'i phung po la sogs pa gzhan kho na bya'o //
T02D1383:274a-2: nyi ma so so'i gza'i phyir dang /
T02D1383:274a-3: tshes kyi longs spyod kyi don du da ltar pa'i
T02D1383:274a-4: zla ba'i dkar po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa 'das
T02D1383:274a-5: pa dang / da ltar ba'i tshes rnams grangs ji lta par bsnan pa dang dbri ba dang /
T02D1383:274a-6: slar yang bsnan pa ni gza' dang dbyu gu dang rkang pa rnams su'o //
T02D1383:274a-7: ril po la bcu bzhis bgos pas thob pa gnyis
T02D1383:274a-8: sam bzhi 'am ma thob kyang mnyam pa'i phung por
T02D1383:274a-9: shes par bya'o // gcig gam gsum thob pa ni mi mnyam pa'o //
T02D1383:274a-10: 'di las lhag pa mi thob ste /
T02D1383:274a-11: gang gi tshe nyi shu rtsa bdun pas lhag pa'i ril po mi 'gyur zhing //
T02D1383:274a-12: de yang tshes sum cu dang bcas na lnga bcu rtsa bdun las lhag par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:274a-13: mnyam na zla ba'i rkang pa rnams spyin par bya zhing mi mnyam na dbri par bya'o //
T02D1383:274a-15: stong par stong pa rnam dag bcu gsum ri bong
T02D1383:274a-16: can la rkang pa lnga sta mig dang nyi mar
T02D1383:274a-17: phyogs // bcu gcig me la tshes zhes bya ba
T02D1383:274a-18: bcu dang chu gter rkang pa nyi shur gcig gis
T02D1383:274a-19: phyogs // ma tshang ngo / lnga dang bu gar
T02D1383:274a-20: nyi shu gnyis te dus dang nor la rgyal pa
T02D1383:274a-21: bdun par nyi shu rtsa lnga'o //
T02D1383:274a-22: der ni nyi ma'i rab tu dbye bas nyin byed
T02D1383:274a-23: bsnan dang 'bri ba byas pas rab tu gsal par
T02D1383:274a-24: 'gyur / rnam dag ces pa ni cung zad spyin pa'am dbri ba med pa'o //
T02D1383:274a-25: der ni zhes bya ba dbyu gu'i phung por ro //
T02D1383:274a-26: nyi ma'i rab tu dbye pas ni nyi ma'i rkang par gyur pa rnams te /
T02D1383:274a-27: nyi ma'i bu lon ni de'i yang bu lon no //
T02D1383:274a-28: nyi ma'i nor ni de'i yang nor ro zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i rab tu dbye ba'o //
T02D1383:274a-30: 'chad par 'gyur pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba la sogs pas bgos pas thob pa bsres pa'am /
T02D1383:274a-31: dor pa'i nyi ma rgyu pa'i rkang pa rnams spyi
T02D1383:274a-32: pa ji ltar yod par gyur pa de snyed ni
T02D1383:274a-34: gal te nyi ma'i longs spyod du snon pa ni de'i tshe gza'i chu tshod la yang bsnan no //
T02D1383:274a-35: yang na nyi ma'i longs spyod la 'brid na yang dbri par bya'o //
T02D1383:274a-36: zla ba'i rkang pa rnams kyang 'byung dang 'byung pa
T02D1383:274a-37: mda' dang rig byed me lag ri bong can rnams
T02D1383:274a-38: mdun gyi cha dang rgyab tu yang //
T02D1383:274a-39: mdun gyi char ni steng nas go rims kyis te /
T02D1383:274b-0: @274b dbus su thad kar re kh'a gzhag pa'i rgyab
T02D1383:274b-1: tu 'ong nas ri bong can la sogs pa go
T02D1383:274b-2: rims bzlog nas bcu bzhi po rnams bri bar bya'o
T02D1383:274b-3: zhes pa ste / 'dir gza' thams cad kyi rkang pa dgod pa'o //
T02D1383:274b-4: gza' thams cad kyi rkang pa rnam ni dbyu gu'i bdag nyid kho na'o //
T02D1383:274b-5: 'dir bcu bzhis bgos pa'i lhag mas mtshon pa ni rgyu pa'i rkang pa'o //
T02D1383:274b-6: de'i steng mar rgyu zhing yod pa ste der gza' zhugs pa'o //
T02D1383:274b-7: des ril po'i cha shas bsgyur pa la brgya nyi shu rtsa drug gis bgos pas thob pa dang /
T02D1383:274b-8: lhag ma drug cu la sogs pas bsgyur nas bgos
T02D1383:274b-9: pas thob pa'i chu srang la sogs pa bdun gyi
T02D1383:274b-10: phyed la ni longs spyod pa'i rkang pa dang /
T02D1383:274b-11: rgyab ma'i phyed du de dor nas longs spyod pa'i
T02D1383:274b-12: rkang pa nyi gza'i dbyu gu'i gnas su spyin pa'am
T02D1383:274b-13: dbri par bya'o // de nas gza'i gnas su gcig la sogs pa nyi ma gza' rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1383:274b-14: tshes su ni dbyu gu la sogs pa rnams nyi ma shar ba nas brtsams nas //
T02D1383:274b-15: longs spyod par bya ba yin no //
T02D1383:274b-16: nyin zhag so so la nyi mas skar ma la
T02D1383:274b-17: longs spyod pa'i don du dkar po la sogs par
T02D1383:274b-18: smos pa'i tshes gnas gnyis su byas te /
T02D1383:274b-19: gcig la dbyu gu bzhis bsgyur cing /
T02D1383:274b-20: gzhan la yang byed pa'i rim pas nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi chu srang gis sam /
T02D1383:274b-21: grub pa'i mtha'i rim pas ni chu srang nyi shu rtsa drug gis bsgyur la /
T02D1383:274b-22: drug cus bgos te thob pa ni steng du gzhug go //
T02D1383:274b-23: steng gi dbyu gu yang drug cus bgos pas thob pa ni rgyu skar du dang /
T02D1383:274b-24: bgos pa'i lhag ma skar ma'i dbyu gur gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1383:274b-25: chu srang yang rgyu skar gyi dbyu gu'i 'og tu dbri par bya'o //
T02D1383:274b-26: rgyu skar dang de'i dbyu gu'i phung po dang chu srang rnams gnas gnyis su byas te /
T02D1383:274b-27: gcig lar bi ka'i don du rkang pa gsum dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar drug sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D1383:274b-28: lug dang dbyug pa la sogs pa sbyang pa las
T02D1383:274b-29: gzhan de ma thag pa skyes pa'i khyim du 'gyur
T02D1383:274b-30: ro // lug zung karka ta ni zla ba ba
T02D1383:274b-31: bsangs dang nyi ma seng ge bu mo srang rnams
T02D1383:274b-32: ro // ni // mig dmar phur bu sgra gcan
T02D1383:274b-33: sdig pa gzhu yi thog ma tha mar gza' lhag
T02D1383:274b-36: thog ma tha mar zhes pa la gzhu'i thog ma'i cha ni spen pa'o //
T02D1383:275a-0: tha ma ni mjug rings kyi'o @275a * //
T02D1383:275a-2: 'dir gal te bu lon gyi phung po lhag la /
T02D1383:275a-3: longs spyod kyi phung po nyung ba na /
T02D1383:275a-4: de la rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo nyi shu rtsa
T02D1383:275a-5: bdun rgyu skar gyi gnas su bcug ste sbyang par
T02D1383:275a-6: bya'o // gal te sbyangs pa'i lhag ma 'khor lo
T02D1383:275a-7: phyed byung na de'i tshe 'khor lo phyed pa de
T02D1383:275a-8: dor par bya ste de nyid rim pa min par
T02D1383:275a-9: bya'o // shes par bya'o // 'khor lo phyed mdor na ni rim pa kho na'o //
T02D1383:275a-10: rgyu skar la drug cus bsgyur nas /
T02D1383:275a-11: 'og gi dbyu gu dang ldan pa la 'byung ba
T02D1383:275a-12: mi zla bas bgos pas thob pa ni khyim rgyu
T02D1383:275a-13: ba shes par byed pa ste /
T02D1383:275a-14: khyim rgyu ba shes nas dbye par bya'o //
T02D1383:275a-15: ro dang zung dang zla ba rnams ngal pa'i las la khyim drug gi rkang pa ste /
T02D1383:275a-16: ka rka ta la sogs pa skyes pa la sogs pa'i khyim drug tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:275a-17: rkang pa 'di lta bu ni gza' thams cad kyi bul pa'i las la'o //
T02D1383:275a-18: 'byung pa la sogs pas mtho ba na yang rgyu
T02D1383:275a-19: pa'i rkang pa dang po la gza' gnas so zhes
T02D1383:275a-21: de'i tshe des bgos pa'i lhag ma'i dbyu gu rnams
T02D1383:275a-22: bsgyur la zhes pa la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur
T02D1383:275a-23: pa ltar bya'o // de la gza' thams cad kyi
T02D1383:275a-24: bul pa'i las la rim pas ni bu lon la
T02D1383:275a-25: rim pa min pas nor du shes par bya'o //
T02D1383:275a-26: de nas longs spyod pa'i rkang pa las gnyis pa longs spyod par bya bas longs spyod do //
T02D1383:275a-27: des bgos pa'i lhag ma'i dbyu gu rnams bsgyur la
T02D1383:275a-28: 'byung pa la sogs pas bgos pa thob pa longs
T02D1383:275a-29: spyod kyi cha dang lhan cig tu sngon ma phyed
T02D1383:275a-30: la / khyim gyi dbang las gza'i longs spyod pa'i rkang pa rnams bsdoms pa dang /
T02D1383:275a-31: phyi ma phyed la bgos pas thob pa'i longs spyod
T02D1383:275a-32: kyi cha dor nas long spyod kyi cha gzhan dang
T02D1383:275a-33: lhan cig longs ma spyad pa'i rgyu pa'i rkang pa
T02D1383:275a-34: bsdoms pa rnams / nor dang bu lon gyi dbang
T02D1383:275a-35: las gza'i longs spyod kyi dbyu gu la bsnan pa'am
T02D1383:275a-36: bsdoms pa rnams / dbri'o // 'di nyid ni nyi ma'i dag pa'i ra bi ka'o //
T02D1383:275a-37: nyi ma'i skar ma'i gnas su skar ma la sogs pa rnams ni longs spyod pa'o //
T02D1383:275a-38: lhag ma ni longs spyod bya'o //
T02D1383:275a-39: 'chad par 'gyur pa'i zla ba la yang de ltar sbyor pa yang ngo /
T02D1383:275a-41: // / da ni nyi ma'i ma dag pa'i ra bi ka brjod par bya ste /
T02D1383:275a-42: nyi mar dus dang ro dang klu dang bcu dang
T02D1383:275a-43: 'phrog byed drag po phyogs dang klu dang drug /
T02D1383:275b-0: me dang nam @275b mkha' byang dang lho ru bgrod
T02D1383:275b-1: pa'i mthar gyur pa na nor dang bu lon dag
T02D1383:275b-2: bya'o // zla ba drug la phyogs kyi dbye pas
T02D1383:275b-3: nyin mor byed pa rgyu pa'i zla ba 'pho pa'i
T02D1383:275b-4: bya'o // dbye pas so // zhes pas /
T02D1383:275b-5: 'dir ka rka ta la sogs pa nas dbri ste phyogs dang po la dus so //
T02D1383:275b-6: karka ta'i phyogs gnyis pa la ro'o //
T02D1383:275b-7: de bzhin du gzhu la me dang nam mkha' bgrod pa'i mthar ro //
T02D1383:275b-8: de ltar chu srin la sogs pa la spyin no zhes bya'o //
T02D1383:275b-9: zla bas rgyu skar la longs spyod pa'i don du
T02D1383:275b-10: nyi ma'i longs spyod kyi rgyu skar gyi gnas su
T02D1383:275b-11: dkar po la sogs par smos pa'i tshes rnams sbyin
T02D1383:275b-12: no // de'i rjes la tshes de dag gnas gzhan du ro yis bsgyur la /
T02D1383:275b-13: gza'i longs spyod kyi dbyu gu la sogs pas bsres te /
T02D1383:275b-14: nyi ma'i longs spyod kyi dbyu gu'i gnas su bu
T02D1383:275b-15: lon zhes bya ba ste phri ba 'di las zla
T02D1383:275b-17: nyi ma'i longs spyod dang zla ba'i longs spyod bsres bar 'gyur ro /
T02D1383:275b-19: // / dkar po la sogs par smos pa'i tshes rnams
T02D1383:275b-20: gnyis kyis bsgyur la gcig dor te srid ni bdun
T02D1383:275b-21: gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma byed par gyur to //
T02D1383:275b-22: byed pa'i longs spyod ni tshes kyi longs spyod nyid do //
T02D1383:275b-24: dbugs kyi gnas su drug las lhag pa'i dbugs mi gnas so //
T02D1383:275b-25: dus kyis bgos pas thob pa ni chu srang du gzhug go //
T02D1383:275b-26: de yang drug cu las lhag pa mi gnas so //
T02D1383:275b-27: drug cus bgos pas thob pa ni dbyu gur gzhug
T02D1383:275b-28: go / dbyu gu yag de bzhin du gza' 'am
T02D1383:275b-30: gza' yang bdun du gyur pa na rnam par 'jig go //
T02D1383:275b-31: skar ma yang nyi shu rtsa bdun du gyur pa na mi gnas so //
T02D1383:275b-32: sbyor pa yang de bzhin no //
T02D1383:275b-36: nyin zhag gcig la dbyu gu drug cu'o //
T02D1383:275b-37: de la gza' ni nyi ma la sogs pa bdun no //
T02D1383:275b-38: tshes ni gcig la sogs pa bco lnga'o //
T02D1383:275b-39: skar ma ni tha skar dang /
T02D1383:275b-54: sa ga dang lha mtshams dang /
T02D1383:276a-2: nam gru zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa bdun no //
T02D1383:276a-3: de bzhin du sbyor ba ni rnam par sel ba dang /
T02D1383:276a-29: rnam par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ste nyi shu rtsa bdun no //
T02D1383:276a-30: byed pa rnams ni ba bam dang /
T02D1383:276a-36: bishti zhes bya ba ste bdun no //
T02D1383:276a-37: de bzhin du sha ku ni dang /
T02D1383:276a-40: ki stu gh'a na zhes bya ba dang bcu gcig go //
T02D1383:276a-41: de la dkar po'i tshes gcig gi phyi ma phyed nas brtsams nas /
T02D1383:276a-42: re re zhing thun bzhi la longs spyod cing grangs
T02D1383:276a-43: kyi go rims ji lta ba bzhin du yang dang
T02D1383:276a-44: yang du 'khor bas nag po'i bcu bzhi'i sngon ma
T02D1383:276a-45: phyed kyi bar du bdun po rnams longs spyod do
T02D1383:276a-46: // de'i phyi ma phyed nas brtsams nas dkar po'i
T02D1383:276a-47: tshes gcig gi sngon ma phyed kyi bar ni gzhan
T02D1383:276a-49: tshes kyi longs spyod la mnyam par cha gnyis su byas te /
T02D1383:276a-51: phyi ma phyed du rnam par gzhag par shes par bya'o //
T02D1383:276a-56: byed pa ste yan lag lnga'i rim pa'o //
T02D1383:276a-59: smin drug gi rkang pa gcig gis lug go //
T02D1383:276a-60: de bzhin du so sor rkang pa dgu'i bcu gnyis po rnams te /
T02D1383:276a-72: nya'i khyim rnams sa ga la sogs par shes par bya'o //
T02D1383:276a-73: mig dmar pa sangs gza' ltag zla ba nyi ma dang //
T02D1383:276a-74: gza' lhag pa ba sangs dang mig dmar phur bu dang //
T02D1383:276a-75: spen pa spen pa phur bu rnams ni rim pa yis //
T02D1383:276a-76: khyim 'di rnams su zhing can du ni yang dag 'dod //
T02D1383:276b-0: @276b kla klo dbang ba'i lo dag pa'i lo la
T02D1383:276b-1: brgyad bsres pa bzhi brgyas bsgyur ba la sngar dag
T02D1383:276b-2: pa'i lo la brgyad bsres pas phri ba la /
T02D1383:276b-3: bcu bdun lhag pa'i sum brgyas pa gos pas thob par gnyis bsres pa ni gzar 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:276b-4: bgos pa'i lhag ma drug cus bsgyur te /
T02D1383:276b-5: dbyu gur byas pa bcu bdun la sogs pas bgos pas thob pa bzung la /
T02D1383:276b-6: bgos pas thob pa'i lhag ma dbye bar bya'o //
T02D1383:276b-7: thob pa'i dbyu gu la sum cu bsres la drug
T02D1383:276b-8: cus bgos pas thob pa gnyis bsres pa'i gzar gzhug
T02D1383:276b-9: go // bgos pa'i lhag ma gza'i dbyu gu'i bstan pa ste 'og tu'o //
T02D1383:276b-10: gza' la yang bdun gyis bgos pa'i lhag ma lo
T02D1383:276b-11: ma 'phos kyi bar steng du gza'i dhru ba kar
T02D1383:276b-12: 'gyur ro // 'dir gang gi tshe nyi ma nya
T02D1383:276b-13: spangs nas lug tu 'gro pa de'i tshe gzhug pa'i
T02D1383:276b-14: gzhug bya bcu gnyis lug la sogs par rim pa
T02D1383:276b-15: 'gyur ro // bzhin / zla ba ri dang 'byung
T02D1383:276b-16: ba rig byed yon tan mda' dang ri bong can
T02D1383:276b-17: ri zla ba gsum pa la'o //
T02D1383:276b-18: rig byed me dang 'byung ba zla ba mig dang
T02D1383:276b-19: lag pa zung dang rig byed mig ni drug pa
T02D1383:276b-20: la'o // drug dang zla ba mda' dang zla ba
T02D1383:276b-21: ri zung me drug zla ba rig byed ri dang
T02D1383:276b-22: la'o // 'jig rten no // drug dang rig byed
T02D1383:276b-23: stong dang stong pa mig dang mda' yi rkang pa
T02D1383:276b-24: rnams ni nya yi khyim du nyi ma'o //
T02D1383:276b-25: zhes pa 'di rnams kyi dgos pa ni /
T02D1383:276b-26: re'u mig bcu gnyis po 'di rnams te /
T02D1383:276b-27: so sor thog mar gza' nges par sbyin no //
T02D1383:276b-28: gnyis pa lnga bcu rtsa bdun la sogs pa dbyu
T02D1383:276b-29: gu'i brtan par 'gyur ro zhes pa byed pa'i 'pho
T02D1383:276b-30: ba ste / gza' dang de'i longs spyod du shes par bya'o //
T02D1383:276b-31: da ni mig dmar la sogs pa rgyu skar la
T02D1383:276b-32: longs spyod pa'i don du nyin zhag gi grangs brjod
T02D1383:276b-33: de / dag pa'i zla ba rnams nyin zhag gi phung po'i don du sum cus bsgyur la /
T02D1383:276b-34: dkar po la sogs par smos pa'i tshes dang bcas pa gnas gsum du byas la /
T02D1383:276b-35: 'og gi phung po ri dang nam mkha' ri yis bgos pas thob pa dbus mar sbyin no //
T02D1383:276b-36: de nas dbus ma drug cu rtsa bzhis bgos pas
T02D1383:276b-37: thob pas phri ba'i steng ma'i phung po mi gsal
T02D1383:276b-38: ba'i nyin zhag gi tshogs yin no //
T02D1383:276b-40: gcig la gza' bdun gyis bgos pas /
T02D1383:276b-41: gal te de nyin zhag gi gzar ma gyur na /
T02D1383:277a-0: @277a * // de nas gcig la sogs pa ji ltar gzar 'gyur
T02D1383:277a-1: ba'i thog ma'i phung por sbyin pa'am dbri bas de
T02D1383:277a-2: nas gsal ba'i nyi ma'i tshogs su 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:277a-3: mig dmar dag par bya ba'i don du /
T02D1383:277a-4: gsal ba'i nyin zhag gi tshogs la bdun dang drug cus lhag pa'i brgya bsres nas /
T02D1383:277a-5: mig dmar gyi nyin zhag gi 'khor lo ngi dang
T02D1383:277a-6: klu dang dus kyis bgos pas thob pa ni khyim
T02D1383:277a-7: bskor pa ste phyi mar bya'o //
T02D1383:277a-8: 'di ltar gzhan rnams la yang ngo //
T02D1383:277a-9: lhag ma rgyu skar gyis bsgyur la //
T02D1383:277a-10: rang gi nyin zhag gis 'khor los bgos pas thob pa ni skar mar 'gyur te steng du'o //
T02D1383:277a-11: de'i lhag ma drug cus bsgyur la rang gi nyin
T02D1383:277a-12: zhag gi 'khor los bgos pas thob pa ni dbyu
T02D1383:277a-14: sngar bzhin du chu srang la sogs pa'o //
T02D1383:277a-15: skar ma la sogs pa 'di dag gnas gnyis su bzhag la /
T02D1383:277a-16: gcig la skar ma phyed dang bcas pa'i dgu sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D1383:277a-17: de nas nyin par lug dang dbyug pa zhes bya
T02D1383:277a-18: ba la sogs pa gsum pa rnams shes par bya'o
T02D1383:277a-19: // bye brag tu 'dir de kho na nyid ri dang /
T02D1383:277a-20: bco brgyad dang ri rnams bul ba'i las kyi rkang pa'o //
T02D1383:277a-21: skar ma la sogs pa gzhan la 'am 'bri ba'o
T02D1383:277a-22: zhes pa mig dmar gyis bul ba'i las dag pa'o
T02D1383:277a-23: // myur ba'i las la yang mig dmar dang /
T02D1383:277a-25: spen pa rnams bul ba'i las yongs su dag pa'i longs spyod gnas gnyis su byas te /
T02D1383:277a-26: gcig gis nyin byed ma byas pa'i nyi ma'i longs
T02D1383:277a-27: spyod tshes bsres pa dag par ma byas te rkang
T02D1383:277a-28: pa gsum dang bcas pa'i skar ma drug dor ba
T02D1383:277a-29: la sogs pa'i chos ma byas pa la sbyang bar
T02D1383:277a-30: bya'o // de nas nye bar brjod pa'i gal te
T02D1383:277a-31: bu lon zhes pa la sogs pa nas rim pa
T02D1383:277a-32: kho na'o zhes pa'i bar du shes par bya'o //
T02D1383:277a-33: 'dir myur ba'i bya pa la rim pas ni nor te bsnan cing /
T02D1383:277a-34: rim pa min pas ni bu lon ta dbri bar bya'o //
T02D1383:277a-35: sbyangs shing ji tsam yod pa dor ba'i lhag mas
T02D1383:277a-36: gza'i rkang pa rtogs par byed pa ste rkang pa
T02D1383:277a-37: rnyed pa shes nas phyi bar bya'o //
T02D1383:277a-38: rkang pa de nyid kyis dbyu gu lhag mas bsgyur la /
T02D1383:277a-39: drug cus bgos pas thob pa dang /
T02D1383:277a-40: rkang pa de'i che dang lhan cig sngon ma phyed
T02D1383:277b-0: du khyim rgyu ba'i dbang gis gza' @277b yis longs
T02D1383:277b-1: spyod pa'i dbang gis rkang pa rnams bsdams pa dang
T02D1383:277b-2: phyi ma phyed du ni bgos pas thob pa dang
T02D1383:277b-3: / rkang pa de'i cha dor te rkang pa gzhan
T02D1383:277b-4: ma de'i cha dang lhan cig longs ma spyad pa
T02D1383:277b-5: / rnams / gzhan bul ba'i las kyis dag pa'i gza'i longs spyod la bsnan pa'am dbri bar bya'o //
T02D1383:277b-6: 'dir rkang pa ni bcu bzhi ste /
T02D1383:277b-7: rgyal ba me mig rnam gsum zla ba lag pa gnyis //
T02D1383:277b-8: bco brgyad tshes dang drag po me dang rtsa ba nas //
T02D1383:277b-9: bcu gcig brgyad dang me'o nam mkha' klung dang ni //
T02D1383:277b-10: de rjes lnga bcu gsum po 'di rnams mig dmar gyi'o //
T02D1383:277b-12: dbus nas thad kar re ka'o //
T02D1383:277b-13: phyogs phyogs bug pa nor drug drug / gnyis gcig rtsa ba yon tan ro //
T02D1383:277b-14: bug pa drag po rgyal po ri //
T02D1383:277b-15: phur bu'i myur las rkang pa yin //
T02D1383:277b-16: dus mda' mda' dang rig byed mig dang /
T02D1383:277b-18: rtsa nas gnyis zung zla ro brgyad gsum ni spen pa'i rkang pa'o //
T02D1383:277b-19: tshigs su bcad pa phyed pa'o //
T02D1383:277b-20: de bzhin du bul ba'i nyi ma gnas gnyis su gzhag pa gcig gis gza' lhag gi rgyu ba'am /
T02D1383:277b-21: pa ba sangs kyi rgyu ba la sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D1383:277b-22: de nas sbyangs te zhes pa la sogs pa nas /
T02D1383:277b-23: longs ma spyad pa rnams shes pa'i mthar thug la /
T02D1383:277b-24: de ma thag tu mig dmar du gsungs pa rnams byas la /
T02D1383:277b-25: gzhan bul ba'i nyi mar bsnan pa'am dbri bar bya'o //
T02D1383:277b-26: de ltar de nyid gza' lhag gi longs spyod dang /
T02D1383:277b-27: pa ba sangs kyi longs spyod du 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:277b-28: rgyal po rgyal po de nas tshes //
T02D1383:277b-29: mi dang yan lag zhi ba ri //
T02D1383:277b-30: lnga mkha' rtsa ba nas ni mtsho //
T02D1383:277b-31: dbang phyug nyi shu nyi shu brgyad //
T02D1383:277b-32: sum cu rtsa bzhi gza' lhag gi //
T02D1383:277b-33: gsum du de nyid gnyis rgyal ba //
T02D1383:277b-34: gnyis su gnyis mig skyon tshes brgyad //
T02D1383:277b-35: rtsa ba nas drug mkha' me dang //
T02D1383:277b-36: bug pa bug pa yon tan ri //
T02D1383:277b-37: pa sangs myur rgyu'i rkang pa'o //
T02D1383:277b-38: zhes pa ni bul ba la sogs pa'i myur ba'i las dag pa'o //
T02D1383:277b-39: bul ba'i las la gza' lhag dag pa'i don du
T02D1383:277b-40: gsal ba'i nyi ma'i tshogs rnams brgya yis bsgyur nas
T02D1383:277b-41: / me dang nyi ma ri yis phri ba las
T02D1383:277b-42: gza' lhag gi nyi ma'i 'khor lo ri dang bug
T02D1383:277b-43: pa ri dang klu yis bgos pas thob pa zhes
T02D1383:277b-44: bya ba la sogs pa nas /
T02D1383:278a-0: @278a * // chu srang la sogs pa'o zhes pa'i bar du mig dmar bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1383:278a-1: rgyu skar la sogs pa 'di dag ni myur ba'i las kyi don du rgyu ba zhes brjod do //
T02D1383:278a-2: de'i phyir de'i don du gnas gzhan du bzhag go //
T02D1383:278a-3: nyi byed ma byas pa'i nyi ma'i longs spyod gnas
T02D1383:278a-4: gnyis su byas te nyi ma'i longs spyod gcig la
T02D1383:278a-5: rgyu skar phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu drug sbyang bar
T02D1383:278a-6: bya'o // de nas nyi mar brjod pa'i lug ces
T02D1383:278a-7: pa la sogs pa nas nor dang bu lon gyi
T02D1383:278a-8: dbang las shes pa'i mthar thag pa byas te /
T02D1383:278a-9: nyi ma'i longs spyod gzhan la bsnan pa'am dbri bar
T02D1383:278a-10: bya'o zhes pa ni gza' lhag gi bul ba'i las
T02D1383:278a-11: dag pa'o // 'di ni gzhan du nyi ma'i longs
T02D1383:278a-12: spyod bul ba'i las dag pa gza' lhag gi bdag
T02D1383:278a-14: myur ba'i las kyi don du ni bul ba'i nyi ma zhes brjod do //
T02D1383:278a-15: bcu dang ri dang rtse mo can ni bul ba'i las kyi rkang pa'o //
T02D1383:278a-16: phur bu dag pa'i don du gsal ba'i nyi ma'i tshogs la /
T02D1383:278a-17: mkha' dang nam mkha' dang ro dang mig gis phri
T02D1383:278a-18: ba la phur bu'i nyi ma'i 'khor lo so dang
T02D1383:278a-19: me dang rgya mtshos bgos pas thob pa zhes pa
T02D1383:278a-20: la sogs pa sa'i bu bzhin bya'o //
T02D1383:278a-22: rgyu skar bcu gnyis sbyang ba dang /
T02D1383:278a-24: dgu dang rtse mo can ni rkang ba'o //
T02D1383:278a-25: pa ba sangs dag pa'i don du gsal ba'i nyi
T02D1383:278a-26: ma'i tshogs la bcu yis bsgyur nas brgyad cu rtsa
T02D1383:278a-28: pa ba sangs kyi nyin zhag gi 'khor lo ri
T02D1383:278a-29: dang rgyal ba mig gis bgos pas thob pa zhes
T02D1383:278a-30: pa la sogs pa thams cad gza' lhag bzhin du
T02D1383:278a-31: bya'o // khyad par ni 'di yin te /
T02D1383:278a-32: rgyu skar drug sbyang ba dang /
T02D1383:278a-34: zung dang ri bong can no //
T02D1383:278a-35: spen pa dag pa'i don du gsal ba'i nyi ma'i
T02D1383:278a-36: tshogs la mkha' dang mig dang brgyad dang rig byed
T02D1383:278a-38: nyi ma'i bu'i nyi ma'i 'khor lo drug dang ro
T02D1383:278a-39: dang ri dang nam mkha' dang gcig gis bgos pas
T02D1383:278a-40: thob pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa mig dmar
T02D1383:278a-41: bzhin du bya'o // khyad par ni rgyu skar bco brgyad sbyang ba dang /
T02D1383:278a-42: nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang tshes dang dus kyi rkang
T02D1383:278a-43: pa rnams zhes bya ba ni gza' lhag la sogs
T02D1383:278a-44: pa'i bul ba'i las yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D1383:278b-0: 'on kyang bul @278b pa'i las dag pa'i gza'i longs
T02D1383:278b-1: spyod myur ba'i las kyis yongs su dag pas na
T02D1383:278b-2: / las gnyis kyis gza' gcig nyid kyis longs spyod
T02D1383:278b-3: dag par 'gyur gyi bul ba'i las dag pa gza'i
T02D1383:278b-4: longs spyod tha dad pa dang myur pa'i las yongs
T02D1383:278b-5: su dag pa tha dad pa yang ma yin no
T02D1383:278b-6: zhes skar ma'i bstan bcos rig pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D1383:278b-7: las gnyis kyis longs spyod yongs su dag pa ni /
T02D1383:278b-13: nyi ma ni bul ba'i las kho nas so //
T02D1383:278b-14: zla ba ni myur pa'i las kho nas so zhes so //
T02D1383:278b-15: sgra gcan gyis rgyu skar la longs spyod pa'i don du /
T02D1383:278b-16: dag pa'i zla bar mig dang nyi ma bsres la
T02D1383:278b-17: zla ba phyed pa'i phung po'i don du gnyis kyis
T02D1383:278b-18: bsgyur bar / nyal zla ba 'dzin pa'i don du zla ba phyed pa gcig bsre zhing /
T02D1383:278b-19: gnam stong la nyi ma 'dzin pa'i don du zla ba phyed pa gnyis bsres pa la /
T02D1383:278b-20: sgra gcan gyi zla ba phyed pa'i 'khor lo nam
T02D1383:278b-21: mkha' dus dang rgya mtsho yis bgos pas thob pa
T02D1383:278b-22: phyi bar bya'o // bgos pa'i lhag ma zla ba
T02D1383:278b-23: phyed pa rnams rgyu skar gyi don du nyi shu
T02D1383:278b-24: rtsa bdun gyis bsgyur ba la nam mkha' la sogs
T02D1383:278b-25: pas thob pa rgyu skar du 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:278b-26: lhag ma drug cus bsgyur ba la nam mkha' la sogs pas bgos pas thob pa ni dbyu gu'o //
T02D1383:278b-27: de'i lhag ma la yang de bzhin du chu srang ngo //
T02D1383:278b-28: de'i lhag ma drug gis bsgyur cing nam mkha' la sogs pas thob pa dbyu gu'o //
T02D1383:278b-29: rgyu skar la sogs pa 'di rnams kyis rgyu skar
T02D1383:278b-30: nyi shu rtsa bdun la phri ba ni sgra gcan
T02D1383:278b-31: gyi kha'i longs spyod du 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:278b-32: kha'i longs spyod de nyid du rgyu skar phyed dang
T02D1383:278b-33: bcas pa'i bcu gsum bsres pa ni mjug ma'i longs
T02D1383:278b-34: spyod la rgyu skar gnyis dang /
T02D1383:278b-36: zla ba drug la rgyu skar bcu gnyis dang dbyu gu drug tu 'gyur zhing /
T02D1383:278b-37: de las bcu gsum phri bas lnga bcu rtsa gsum du 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:278b-39: nyi ma 'dzin pa na gnam stong gi longs spyod la ra bi ka bsnan pa'am phri ba la'o //
T02D1383:278b-40: de nas sgra gcan gyi longs spyod la dbyu gu
T02D1383:278b-41: bzhi bcu zhe lnga phri la lhag ma skar ma'i
T02D1383:278b-42: longs spyod kyis sbyang bar phya'o //
T02D1383:279a-1: gal te kha'am mjug ma dang skar ma mnyam par gyur na /
T02D1383:279a-2: de'i tshe kho na gzas 'dzin gyis gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D1383:279a-3: yang na sngar smras pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub pa'i gnam
T02D1383:279a-4: stong gi nyi ma'i longs spyod kyis sgra gcan gyi
T02D1383:279a-5: kha'i longs spyod dam mjug ma'i longs spyod la sbyang
T02D1383:279a-6: par bya'o // zla ba 'dzin pa ni zla ba
T02D1383:279a-7: nya'i longs spyod kyis sgra gcan gyi kha'i longs spyod
T02D1383:279a-9: kha'am mjug ma dang lhan cig rgyu skar mnyam pa
T02D1383:279a-10: nyid la 'dzin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no
T02D1383:279a-11: // 'dir yang gnam stong gi mtha' 'am nya'i mthar
T02D1383:279a-12: dus tshigs kyi mtshams su sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1383:279a-14: dkyil 'khor gyi sgra ni 'dir dbyu gu drug cu ste /
T02D1383:279a-15: rgyu skar gcig gi longs spyod do //
T02D1383:279a-16: de yang khyim bcu gnyis dang cha bcu drug gi bdag nyid du rig par bya'o //
T02D1383:279a-17: de la gal te sgra gcan gyi longs spyod la 'di gnyis kyi longs spyod dag na /
T02D1383:279a-18: de'i tshe dbyu gu drug cu'i mthar thug pa thams cad 'dzin to //
T02D1383:279a-19: longs spyod phyed par gyur na phyed 'dzin to //
T02D1383:279a-20: cha ni dbyu gu bzhi'i bdag nyid de sgra gcan
T02D1383:279a-21: gyi longs spyod la zhugs na bzhi cha'i bar du
T02D1383:279a-22: gza' dang lhan cig 'gro bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1383:279a-23: gang gi tshe yang sgra gcan gyi kha'i longs spyod
T02D1383:279a-24: du 'dzin pa de'i tshe shar gyi cha nas so
T02D1383:279a-25: // mjug ma'i longs spyod du ni nub kyi cha nas so //
T02D1383:279a-26: de bzhin du phyogs dang phyogs mtshams kyi cha'i khor yug gzhan ni gzhan du shes par bya'o //
T02D1383:279a-27: zhes t'i ka la sogs so //
T02D1383:279a-28: 'dzin pa 'di dag kyang zla ba drug nyid na yin no //
T02D1383:279a-29: don dam par ni zla ba nyid mun pa'i rang bzhin gyi sgra gcan gyis 'dzin te /
T02D1383:279a-30: bsel ba'i 'od zer gyi phyir ro //
T02D1383:279a-32: gnam stong gi mtha'i dus su ni zla ba yang
T02D1383:279a-33: nyi ma la zhugs pa'i phyir ni nyi ma gzung
T02D1383:279a-34: ngo zhes bya ba ni tha snyad do zhes pa
T02D1383:279a-36: mjug rings ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la zhugs nas nyi ma so so la dbyu gu bzhi dang /
T02D1383:279a-37: chu srang nyi shu rtsa drug ni nyi ma'i longs spyod de /
T02D1383:279a-38: de las lhag par chu srang phyed dang gsum ni
T02D1383:279a-39: myur bar rgyu ba ni rim pas mdun nas dang
T02D1383:279a-40: / yon por rgyu ba na rim pa min pas rgyab nas rnam par rgyu'o //
T02D1383:279a-41: de ltar lo gsum gnas nas phyir 'thon no //
T02D1383:279b-0: @279b 'thon nas kyang nyi ma so so la dbyu gu gnyis 'char te /
T02D1383:279b-1: dbyu gu yang rkang pa gnyis pa dang bcas pa'i
T02D1383:279b-2: chu srang lnga bcu rtsa drug gis bdag nyid de
T02D1383:279b-3: / aa ba dh'u t'i las 'thon pa'i phyir mjug rings kyi'o //
T02D1383:279b-4: zla ba gcig gi bar du /
T02D1383:279b-5: du ba med par skar ma bzhin du snod la /
T02D1383:279b-6: de nas zla ba phyed du /
T02D1383:279b-7: du ba'i mjug ma ring por gsal lo //
T02D1383:279b-8: de bzhin du zla ba phyed dang gnyis kyis mthar
T02D1383:279b-9: slar yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la de bzhin du
T02D1383:279b-10: lo gsum gyi bar du mi snang bar 'gyur ro
T02D1383:279b-11: // 'di'i thog mar 'char ba ji ltar grags pa brtags pas shes par bya'o //
T02D1383:279b-12: de ltar 'char ba gcig gi shes na dus dpag tu med pa'i shes par 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:279b-14: 'dir thun mong gi rim pa 'di dag ste myur
T02D1383:279b-15: ba'i las la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor las 'char ba'i
T02D1383:279b-16: gza' rim par bgrod pa na /
T02D1383:279b-17: dbyu gu'i rkang pa bcu bzhi'i phyed las /
T02D1383:279b-18: sngon ma phyed la longs spyod pa na byung par rgyu pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1383:279b-19: phyi ma phyed la longs spyod pa ni bul bar rgyu ba'o //
T02D1383:279b-20: de las 'khor lo phyed dor nas gza'i rim pa ma yin pa ste /
T02D1383:279b-21: sngon ma phyed pa ni yon por rgyu ba'o //
T02D1383:279b-22: phyi ma phyed la 'thon por rgyu ba zhes brjod do //
T02D1383:279b-23: khyim gyi rgyu skar gyi 'khor lo 'dor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1383:279b-24: 'dir rim pa la sngon ma phyed du ni nor 'phel la /
T02D1383:279b-25: gza' rnams kyang shar du mngon par phyogs pa'o //
T02D1383:279b-26: phyi ma phyed du ni nor 'dzad pa dang lhor mngon par phyogs pa'o //
T02D1383:279b-27: rim pa min pa la sngon ma phyed du bu
T02D1383:279b-28: lon 'phel la kha nub tu mngon par phyogs pa'o
T02D1383:279b-29: // phyi ma phyed du bu lon nyams pa dang byang du mngon par phyogs pa'o //
T02D1383:279b-30: 'di dag 'chi ltas la sogs pa'i dbang gis phyogs gzhan du lta ba nyid do //
T02D1383:279b-31: rang bzhin gyis ni sgra gcan kha nub tu phyogs nas ri rab la g-yas skor byed la /
T02D1383:279b-32: gza' gzhan ni shar du kha lta'o //
T02D1383:279b-33: de la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis bsgribs pa'i phyir nyi ma la nub pa ste /
T02D1383:279b-34: gza' thams cad du med pa ni ma yin no //
T02D1383:279b-35: slar yang de bzhin kho nar 'char ro zhes bya'o //
T02D1383:279b-36: 'dir 'phags pa'i yul du nyi ma dang zla ba'i
T02D1383:279b-37: longs spyod 'phel 'grib kyi dbang gis dbyu gu drug
T02D1383:279b-38: cu'i rang bzhin gyi nyin mtshan las bcu yis bgos
T02D1383:280a-1: pa'i dbyu gu rnams kyis nyin mo 'phel bar 'gyur ba ni mtshan mo 'grib ste /
T02D1383:280a-2: lo me'i khor yug gi mtshams nas gangs can chen
T02D1383:280a-3: po'i khor yug gi mtshams kyi bar du dpag tshad
T02D1383:280a-4: stong phrag bdun cu rtsa lnga byang du bgrod pa
T02D1383:280a-5: la zla ba drug gis so //
T02D1383:280a-6: de bzhin du gangs can chen po'i khor yug gi mtshams nas /
T02D1383:280a-7: lo me'i khor yug gi mtshams kyi bar du lhor
T02D1383:280a-8: bgrod pa na mtshams mtshan mo 'phel zhing nyin mo
T02D1383:280a-9: 'grib pa'o // de ltar gyur pa na nyin mtshan
T02D1383:280a-10: so so la chu srang gnyis 'phel pa'am 'grib par
T02D1383:280a-11: 'grib pa'o // shes par bya'o // de bzhin du bod yul dang li yul dang /
T02D1383:280a-12: rgya nag la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang /
T02D1383:280a-13: shambhala'i yul gyi mtha'i bar du dgu dang /
T02D1383:280a-15: bdun gyis bgos pas thob pa'i dbyu gu rnams kyis dang /
T02D1383:280a-16: ke la sha'i dum bur drug gis skal bas nyin mtshan la ji ltar rigs par ro //
T02D1383:280a-17: ke la sha'i dum bu las byang phyogs su gangs
T02D1383:280a-18: can gyi ri'i bar la nyin mtshan so so la
T02D1383:280a-19: dbyugs bzhis lhag pa'i chu srang gsum 'phel ba'am //
T02D1383:280a-21: gangs ri'i phyi rol gyi phyogs mtshams brgyad du khor
T02D1383:280a-22: yug gi rnam pas rgyu skar gyi khyim zlum po
T02D1383:280a-23: gcig tu'o // 'di'i dbus na mnyam pa'i re kh'a'o //
T02D1383:280a-24: de nyid kyi phyogs logs gnyis su gzhu'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1383:280a-25: 'dir yang 'bru ba snyil ba'i dbus kyi ka pa bzhin dang //
T02D1383:280a-27: rgyu skar dbyu gu la sogs pa nas nag pa'i
T02D1383:280a-28: phyed kyi bar du byang phyogs kyi re kh'a la
T02D1383:280a-29: / lho phyogs su yang nag pa'i phyed la sogs pa nas nam gru'i mthar ro //
T02D1383:280a-30: de rnams kho na la rkang pa dang bcas pa'i rgyu skar gnyis la khyim gcig nyid do //
T02D1383:280a-31: de ltar khyim bcu gnyis po rnam par gzhag go //
T02D1383:280a-32: de la brten pa'i gza' ni longs spyod pa'o //
T02D1383:280a-33: byang phyogs su bgrod pa na zlum po 'di'i byang gi mtha' ni /
T02D1383:280a-34: byang gi me'i khor yug gi dang por 'gro'o //
T02D1383:280a-35: lho phyogs kyi mtha' yang gangs can gyi ri'i lho'i mthar reg pa'o //
T02D1383:280a-36: lhor bgrod pa na yang lho phyogs kyi mtha' ni lho'i me'i khor yug gi dang por 'gro'o //
T02D1383:280a-37: byang phyogs kyi mtha' yang bsil ba'i ri'i byang gi mtha' reg par 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:280a-38: rgyu skar la sogs pa 'di dag kyang ri rab
T02D1383:280b-0: la skor ba byed @280b pas 'gro ba'i 'khor ba'i
T02D1383:280b-1: dbang gis zlum po'i rnam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:280b-2: zlum po'i tshad ni lho ni me'i khor yug nas gangs can chen po'i bar ro //
T02D1383:280b-3: dpag tshad stong phrag bdun cu rtsa lngas so //
T02D1383:280b-4: de dag la 'khor lo'i nyin zhag brgya brgyad cu
T02D1383:280b-5: rtsa phyed dang gsum gyis bgos pas thob pa ni
T02D1383:280b-6: phyogs kyi cha nyi mas 'dor ba'o //
T02D1383:280b-7: de ltar dum bu bcu gnyis su nyi ma'i thad kar 'pho bar rig par bya'o //
T02D1383:280b-9: 'on kyang de ltar byed pa'i lam gyis nyi ma dus rtag tu dag pa ma yin la /
T02D1383:280b-10: nyi ma'i longs spyod ma dag 'dis //
T02D1383:280b-11: mig dmar la sogs dag byas la //
T02D1383:280b-13: rtsa ba nyams pa'i ljon shing bzhin //
T02D1383:280b-14: de bas na grub pa'i mtha'i lam brjod par bya ste /
T02D1383:280b-15: de'i rim pa 'di dag gi / sa gzhi mnyam
T02D1383:280b-16: po la khru gang gi tshad kyi mandala gyi dbus
T02D1383:280b-17: su btsugs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi shing gi
T02D1383:280b-18: grib ma / snga dro re kh'a'i phyi rol nas rim gyis bskum pa na /
T02D1383:280b-19: gang gi tshe mandala gyi mtha'i re kh'a'i dbus su zhugs pa de'i tshe /
T02D1383:280b-20: gnas der bya rog gi rjes kyis mtshan ma byas te /
T02D1383:280b-21: de nyid nub kyi phyogs so //
T02D1383:280b-22: phyi dro ni mandala gyi dbus nas rim gyis brkyang ba na /
T02D1383:280b-23: gang gi tshe zhes pa la sogs pa sngar bzhin du mtshan ma bya ste /
T02D1383:280b-24: de nyid shar gyi phyogs so //
T02D1383:280b-25: 'dir mtshan ma gcig gi steng du skud ba bzung ste /
T02D1383:280b-26: mtshan ma gzhan gyi mdun du mandala thod lo khor gyis bya zhing /
T02D1383:280b-27: mtshan ma gzhan gyi steng du yang /
T02D1383:280b-28: skud pa bzung nas de bzhin du byas pas ji ltar nya'i rnam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1383:280b-29: mandala gnyis po 'di dag gi dbus kyi nya'i rnam pa'i kha'i dbus ni lho phyogs so //
T02D1383:280b-30: mjug ma'i dbus ni byang phyogs so //
T02D1383:280b-31: de ltar phyogs gtan la phab nas mandala gnyis po dbyi bar bya'o //
T02D1383:280b-32: byang du bgrod pa'i nyin mo las gong du /
T02D1383:280b-33: nyi ma bcu pa nas brtsams nas //
T02D1383:280b-34: nyi ma'i gung la brtag par bya'o ;
T02D1383:280b-35: / de la thog ma mandala gyi byang phyogs kyi
T02D1383:280b-36: mtha'i re kh'a'i dbus nas mandala gyi nang du nyin
T02D1383:280b-37: mo gang la 'jug pa de nyid byang du bgrod
T02D1383:280b-38: pa'i 'pho ba'i nyin mo'i de'i gza' dang /
T02D1383:281a-0: de'i nyin mo nya'i longs spyod las ga @281a * //
T02D1383:281a-1: la sogs pa'i zla ba dgu'i lugs la sogs pa'i khyim dgu la /
T02D1383:281a-2: rgyu skar gyi gnas su nyi shu dang /
T02D1383:281a-3: dbyu gu'i gnas su bco lnga'o zhes bya ba ni rtsa ba'i dhru ba ka'o //
T02D1383:281a-4: dhru ba ka de la nyin re zhing dbyu gu bzhi dang /
T02D1383:281a-5: chu srang nyi shu rtsa drug bcug la /
T02D1383:281a-6: nyi ma'i rkang ba rnams dag par bya ste /
T02D1383:281a-7: sngar brjod pa'i rkang pa gsum dang bcas pa'i rgyu
T02D1383:281a-8: skar drug sbyang bar bya'o zhes pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1383:281a-9: tshogs so // de skad du yang rtsa ba'i rgyud du /
T02D1383:281a-10: bgrod thog nas brtsams nyin re zhing //
T02D1383:281a-11: slar yang bgrod 'gyur bar du sbyin //
T02D1383:281a-12: gsungs pa'i las kyi cho ga yis //
T02D1383:281a-13: nyi ma'i rkang pa dag par bya //
T02D1383:281a-23: gza' 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu ni gzhan du go sla bas 'dir ma dgrol lo //
T02D1383:281a-24: gza' skar rgya chen 'di dag bshad cing de rnams 'bras pu ni /
T02D1383:281a-25: dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud la 'jug pa 'dir ni ma bshad de /
T02D1383:281a-26: tshig gi 'brel pa gegs med blo bzang rnams kyis bde blag tu //
T02D1383:281a-27: rtogs phyir 'di la dam pa rnams kyis bzod mdzad rigs //
T02D1383:281a-28: 'jigs med kyis brtsams 'di yi snying gi ni //
T02D1383:281a-29: rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i gnas rgyas shing //
T02D1383:281a-30: legs byas shar ba 'di las 'gro gsum la //
T02D1383:281a-31: rgyal ba'i phun sum tshogs pa'i 'bras bur shog //
T02D1383:281a-32: dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa zhes bya ba /
T02D1383:281a-33: slob dpon mkhas pa chen po 'jigs med 'byung gnas sbas pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1383:281a-35: // / pandi ta chen po de nyid dang /
T02D1383:281a-36: bod kyi lo ts'a ba shr'i dharmm'a k'i rti sa bsgyur ba'o //
T02D1383:281a-37: slad kyis yul ma ga dh'a'i pandi ta chen po
T02D1383:281a-38: mkhas btsun grub pa brnyes pa r'a hu la shra'i
